TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebRequestEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 为提供 Web 请求信息的事件定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for events providing Web-request information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Web 请求引发。The is raised at every Web request. 它使用 类来获取请求信息。It uses the class to obtain request information. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将使用标准 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并通过设置配置节来控制它们的行为 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will use the standard ASP.NET health-monitoring types and control their behavior by setting the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以创建自定义类型，如下面的示例中所示。You can also create custom types, as shown in the next example. 如果创建自定义事件类型，并且需要添加自己的信息，请自定义 方法。If you create your custom event type and you need to add your own information, customize the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 类派生以创建自定义事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent/CS/WebRequestEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent/VB/WebRequestEvent.vb#1)] 下面是配置文件的摘录，使 ASP.NET 可以使用自定义事件。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取与 Web 应用程序请求关联的信息。

span.span: Gets the information associated with the Web-application request.

value.span: 与 Web 应用程序请求关联的信息。

span.span: The information associated with the Web-application request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准请求信息由 类定义。The standard request information is defined by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 Web 请求信息。The following code example shows how to obtain the Web-request information.
